mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(userkey, townkey, viewqty, likeqty, create_dtm, update_dtm, isdeleted) VALUES(#{userkey}, #{townkey}, 0, 0, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT k.`key`, k.`value`, COUNT(b.categorykey) AS count FROM `key_table` k LEFT JOIN `board` b ON k.`key` = b.`categorykey` WHERE k.`table` = 'board' AND k.`column` = 'categorykey' AND k.isdeleted = 0 GROUP BY k.`key`, k.`value`;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO key_table (`table`, `column`, `key`, `value`, isdeleted) VALUES ('board', 'categorykey', (SELECT max + 1 FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(`key`), 0) AS max FROM key_table WHERE `table` = 'board' AND `column` = 'categorykey') AS a), #{value}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET isdeleted = 1, delete_dtm = NOW() WHERE categorykey = (SELECT `key` FROM key_table WHERE `value` = #{value}) AND isdeleted = 0;
